TopicTitle: Any of you's in a band or musical group?

Articles.Content:
Simple question, yes or no. Just wanted to get a general idea of how many musicians hang here.

If you are, feel free to elaborate. What genre? How many members? What instrument?

...

Any hot members?

:*P

I myself am kind of in a band but not really. We're not really that well organised yet, and we need a drummer... Nor do we have any idea what we want to be, right now it's just "Play whatever we want." and sadly there's none of the afformentioned hotties. Well, apart from yours truly... We'll probably end up as Emocore (lel) or punk rock with synths mixed in once we've sorted things out. :L

Anyway enough about me, what about you people?

Yes, I am. Two bands.

Genre ; Classical, and Heavy Metal. My classmates dragged me in on the last one , but my role is mostly managing/song-writing.

Hot Members ; One really cute girl in my Classical, all boys in my HM, so I won't bother..

I am in a five-piece band, for which I play guitar and occasionally sing. Genre? For our covers, mostly classic rock and jazz. Our repertoire includes Electric Light Orchestra, Santana, Ray Charles, The Moody Blues, the Doors, and a few others. For our originals? Well, I write most of the songs, and I've been influenced by Kansas, Rush, Genesis, Pink Floyd, and similar artists, so a lot of my songs kind of sound like blends of them. Not sure what you'd call that.

We're not very organized, either. I finished my Master's thesis last fall, so I had very little time to practice, and our keyboard player is finishing is thesis currently, so he has very little time to practice now.
